You can license from Ascender in PS or TTF just go here and click on the Ascender logo [http://www.connare.com/typography.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131102100326/http:/www.connare.com/typography.htm "http://www.connare.com/typography.htm") but beware of the diablo.
